mapper.update: update tb_request set status = #{status}, remark = #{remark} where id =#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT into tb_request (ip, port, path, params, status) INSERT into tb_notice_plan (notice_id, title, des, sender_pid, sender_name, sender_identifdy,recv_pid,recv_name, recv_identify) values (#{noticeId},#{title}, #{des}, #{senderPid},#{senderName},#{senderIdentify}, #{recvPid},#{recvName},#{recvIdentify})
